title: 12/02/2020 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 12/02/2020 - Best of The Herd
description:
-The NBA Christmas Day schedule is why we talk about LeBron so much

-Aaron Rodgers is making the Packers look dumb

-Tom Brady's demise has been laughably overstated

-It doesn't feel like Kevin Durant plans things the way LeBron does


Guest: Joel Klatt, FOX Sports CFB Analyst

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
